K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49a-12: grong khyer chen po de'i chu zheng du ji tsam du gyur par 'phang du'ang de tsam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49a-13: de'i ra ba sra zhing brtan te mi phyed la mi shigs pa dag kyang de tsam du gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49a-15: grong khyer chen po de'ang 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49a-17: 'bru'i snod byur bur gyur pa bzhin du bye mas gang par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49a-20: bye ma'i phung po de dag ji tsam du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49a-23: dpag tu ma mchis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49a-29: khong du chud par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49a-31: rtsis mkhan chen po dag gis bye ma'i phung po de dag gi tshad gzung bar ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te @49b byang chub kyi snying po dam pa na bzhugs pa gang dag mnyes par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol zhes bskul cing gsol ba btab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tshad gzung bar ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-3: de bas ches mang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dag byas te phul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-4: de bas ches mang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la me tog gi 'khor lo dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-5: spos kyi 'khor lo dag phul ba'ang re zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su ma bsngos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la gser dngul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-7: shing las byas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa'i 'khor lo thams cad gzhan dag phul ba lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la de dag dbul ba na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-10: yang dang yang du gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-11: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i khyu mchog rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:49b-12: de'i tshe rgyal po rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyis 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi'i skye rgu'i 'khor los bsgyur @50a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-1: bas dbang phyug la dbang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-2: de gang gi tshe btsun mo'i 'khor tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-3: skyed mos tshal na 'dug par gyur kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-4: 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis dga' bar 'dod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-7: de la btsun mo'i 'khor de glu gar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-8: rol mo 'dod pa dang ldan pa dag byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-9: de'i tshe des mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-10: sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa'i sgra thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-11: de'i tshe de 'dod pa'i yon tan dag las yid byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-14: skyo ba'i yid dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa ga la bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-15: 'ongs pa de la bcom ldan 'das des sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gleng ba mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-16: des de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-18: 'di ltar sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-20: dus de srid 'das kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag thugs su chud kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-22: de las dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig kyang mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de snyed la 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi sbag pas sbags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50a-26: rgyal srid kyi sbag pas spags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-0: dbang phyug gis spags pa bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba dag byas shing byas nas kyang @50b mngon par mi shes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-1: byang chub tu'ang yongs su ma bsngos su zin kyang gang da ltar bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba gang nges par mngon par 'du byed pa de sems can thams cad kyi don du yongs su bsngo bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-2: gang dang gang du so sor skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-3: gang dang gang du skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro bar gyur pa thams cad du sems can de dag la rang rang gi sgra mngon par brjod pas sgra 'byin par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-5: de thams cad kyang sems can rnams kyis mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-7: bdag med pa'i sgra thos par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rtsva dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-9: nags tshal gang dag yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-10: tha na sor bzhi tsam pa dag kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-11: thams cad las mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-13: bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-14: sgra de'ang sems can thams cad kyis thos par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-15: tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad kyang 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i khyu mchog gi ye shes ji 'dra ba de lta bu'i theg pa chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:50b-17: zhes rgyal po rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyis 'bar bas de ltar rig nas stan langs te bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-0: gang du bdag dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa'i rnam par rgyal @51a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-1: ba na bdag gi bdog pa gang ci'ang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-2: de thams cad sangs rgyas la sogs pa 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis longs spyad ba'i slad du phul lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-3: phul nas kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyis 'bar ba khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-4: de rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po de'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'ang rjes su rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-5: rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor las khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-6: de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas grong mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-7: yul mi dag kyang rjes su rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-9: mdor na khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rjes su rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-10: de dag de ltar rab tu byung ma thag tu brtson 'grus brtsams pas gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-11: dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas de dag ring po ma thogs pa nyid du mngon par shes pa lnga skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-12: de dag rang gi mngon par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-15: skye ba de nyid kyis shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51a-18: chos bstan du gsol zhes chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul cing gsol ba btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-0: de @51b bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-4: de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-5: de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-8: chos bstan du gsol zhes chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul cing gsol ba btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-9: de phyin chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyis 'bar ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par nam yang ma skyes shing mngal du skye ba nam yang yongs su ma bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du song ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yal ga'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-14: nags tshal gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad las mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-17: bdag med pa'i sgra dag grag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-18: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khor ba de dag kyang de'i tshe rang rang gi sgra rab tu brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-19: phan tshun sgra thos shing mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:51b-21: bdag med pa'i sgra thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52a-0: de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i khyu mchog rgyal po de las sngon gyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thos nas khyim nas khyim med par @52a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos shing lus thob pa des kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so sor thob la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pas kyang shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po dam pa na bzhugs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul cing gsol ba btab la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52a-5: de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad du song nas rgyas par byas pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyis 'bar ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52a-7: khyod kyis de ltar blta bar mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52a-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52a-12: 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52a-13: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-0: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom @52b ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-4: stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-5: bcom ldan 'das des padma chen po 'di'ang bskur ba lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las padma chen po de bzhes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-8: bzhes nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-10: ci sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro de stobs dang ldan nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-13: bde bar reg pa la gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro de stobs dang ldan zhing snyun mi mnga' la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-16: bde bar reg pa la gnas lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-17: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:52b-18: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-0: gsum yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yongs su dag pa @53a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-3: bden par yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-4: smon lam gyis tshul khrims tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-5: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i lhag mthong gis yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir lta ba tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na tshul khrims nyams pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-9: cho ga nyams pa'i sems can gang yang ma mchis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyams pa gsum po dag gi ming yang mi gda' lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams de las brtsams na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-14: dgu ma pa'i rib ma dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-15: gcig la gcig 'gums par bgyid pa lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams der gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-19: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyis 'khor lo bskor ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-22: 'jig rten gyi khams der ci zhig bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53a-23: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid du sems can rnams la chos bstan pas chog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-0: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos @53b kyi 'khor lo bskor bas lan gnyis su'ang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams der gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams der gal te bcom ldan 'das mi gshegs na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-5: bdag gis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-6: sems kyi smon lam gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sug par bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-7: nam mkha' las 'jig rten gyi khams der gzhag par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mthu yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-9: sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-10: yid dang bar bya ba'i phyir btang snyoms su mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-14: rdza mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis rdza mkhan gyi 'phang lo la dbyug gus btsugs pa 'khor bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-15: mig kyang sbrid par byed pa de bzhin du de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yongs su bsgyur nas mngon par bteg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-16: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de mngon par bteg cing kun tu 'khrugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:53b-17: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khrid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khrid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnar snyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-10: pho brang 'khor skyong gi skad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-11: skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-13: ma tshang ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-14: shin tu rnam par rig par byed pa ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig gis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-17: zhes de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-18: de ltar de'i tshe sems can gang dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba la kun tu chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-19: 'jig tshogs la lta ba la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-20: 'jig tshogs la brten pa de dag thams cad de'i tshe skyo bar gyur cing skyo ba thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-21: de ltar 'khor bzhi po dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor cing chos ston pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du chos kyi gdan la bzhugs shing chos ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-0: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bzhin du tshangs pas yongs su bskor te tshangs pa'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos ston @54b pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-1: de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan yang yang dag par bstan pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par sprul ba mdzad pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-3: ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag phan tshun thug par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang khong stong du gyur cing bu ga byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-5: so sor zhig cing rab tu rnam par zhig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-6: de ltar de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu de yang dag par bstan pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag lta ba'i 'du shes can; rtag pa dang ther zug gi 'du shes can tshangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-7: tshangs pa chen po de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-8: rang rang gi tshangs pa'i gnas zhig cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-9: rab tu rnam par zhig la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-11: chu'i phung po chen pos dbu ba rdos pa chen po bskyed na mngon par 'jig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-12: rlung gi phung po chen pos gtor na rdul du 'gyur zhing rab tu 'jig pa de bzhin du tshangs pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su dong nas rdul du 'gyur zhing 'jig pa dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-13: mthong nas kyang shas cher skyo bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:54b-14: de dag skyo bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-0: @55a *// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-2: ngas sngon yang bstan pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-6: yongs su sbab pas yongs su sbags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-8: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-9: snying po med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-10: sgyu ma lta bu'i phyir dbu ba rdos pa lta bur gzung du med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-12: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-13: phyin ci log tu kun brtags pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-15: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-16: nam mkha' la kun tu rgyug pa'i kun tu rtogs pas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir smig rgyu lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-18: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-19: dngos por gzung du med pa'i phyir mig yor lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-21: kyee ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-22: nam mkha'i kun tu rtog pa'i las kyis kun nas bslad pa'i phyir brag ca lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-24: 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ji lta ba bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-26: 'jig rten gnas pa 'di phyin ci log tu de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-28: kyee ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55a-30: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-0: chags pa med par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par @55b rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-3: ro myang pa med pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-5: nges par 'byung ba med pa'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ngas mngon par mkhyen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-6: de ltar ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid mngon par mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-8: ngas 'jig rten 'di ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mkhyen pa de bzhin du 'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-9: 'jig rten 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam yang mngon par mkhyen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-11: da ltar ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid mngon par mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-13: de la 'jig rten gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-22: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-24: de la gzugs kyi phung po gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-27: de bzhin gshegs pas 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-29: da ltar byung ba spangs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-32: da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyi phung po gang spangs pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:55b-33: sems can rnams gang 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-2: gzugs kyi phung po ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-3: zhes de skad ces smra bar gyur na mi rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-5: de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-13: gang dag thag nye ba dus gsum du bsdus pa de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-14: gzugs kyi phung po ste; mtshan nyid med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-21: sa'i rnam pa yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-25: rnam par shes pa'i phung por brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-27: ci'i phyir 'di skad ces gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-29: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-31: de dag lus la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-32: ji snyed pa rab tu mi shes pas bdag gzugs yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-34: zhes rnam par rtog par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-36: zhes kyang kun tu shes shing gnas par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-37: de dag de ltar kun tu shes shing gnas par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56a-38: rlom sems su byed pas dngos po de la yongs su sred pa skyed par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-0: dngos po'i tshul shes pa de @56b ni; de lta ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-2: de ltar mig dang gzugs dngos po med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-3: zhes shes pa mi skyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-4: de ltar med pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung nas byis pa rnam rtog pa skyed par byed do; ;rtog pa skyes pa'i byis pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-5: dngos po de la 'jug par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-6: de dag gi nyes pa'i khams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-7: de ltar dngos po med pa'i spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-8: kha dog dang bral ba'i spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-9: kha dog med pa'i spyod yul ba de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-13: mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis 'debs pa lhur len par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-14: de dag gi mngon par 'du byed pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-16: de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-17: dngos po mnyam pa nyid kyis lta ba mnyam pa nyid rjes su sangs rgyas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-18: de rjes su sangs rgyas pas yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dogs par mngon par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-20: mnyam pa yin pas des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-21: yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-22: yang dag par brtson pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-23: yang dag par rnam par grol ba rnams kyi lta ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-24: yang dag par zhugs pa yin pas des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-25: yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-27: ngas yang dag pa'i lta ba gang bshad pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-28: sgras bstan par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-29: bstan par bzod pa dka' ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:56b-32: bsgrubs na khyed cag kyang mun pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-2: 'khor chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-5: 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgo yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-6: chos kyi tshul yang de yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi phung po bstan pa 'di bshad pa na khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-8: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-9: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha khrag khrig kyang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-10: mi'i skye rgu'i sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-11: dzambu'i gling pa bye ba brgya phrag ji snyed yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-12: de dag gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-13: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-14: sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de phyir bsdu ba mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57a-19: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i 'khor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-3: lto 'phye chen po dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-4: de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-5: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-6: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ji tsam du shin tu rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyang mngon par bteg nas 'jig rten gzhan du bzhag lags kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-13: de'i tshe bdag gis mtshan ma'ang ma 'tshal cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-14: rdzu 'phrul gyi ming yang mi dran lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-15: rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'grub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-19: aa la la byang chub sems dpa' de rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-22: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dus 'gyur ba'ang glo bar ma chud cing bdag cag yun ji srid nas drangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-23: yun ji srid nas khrid pa'ang skad cig gcig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:57b-24: thang gcig gcig tsam yang glo bar ma tshud la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-1: kyang rjes su mi dran lags kyang bdag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-3: re zhig byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul de'ang de lta bu lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas lta smos ci 'tshal snyam lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-8: khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'di drangs shing kun tu drangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa khrid cing kun tu khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-12: khyod kyis de ltar blta bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi grva tsam yang bskul ba'i bdag por gyur pa gzhan dge sbyong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-18: lha nas lto 'phye chen po'i bar du'ang ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'degs par nus par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-23: re zhig lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten lta zhog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-24: moonggal gyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58a-25: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gzugs can nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-0: 'du shes can ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa ji snyed yod pa sems can du gdags @58b pas gdags pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-1: mi'i lus thob nas rab tu byung bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-2: rab tu byung ba de dag thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa nyid rjes su thob par gyur cing mngon par shes pa drug mngon du byas par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-5: de ltar khyod bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de lta bu dang yang ldan par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-8: rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa 'dus pa de mang ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-13: nyan thos de dag gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams lag pa gcig gis blangs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-15: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang lag pa gcig gis blangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'chag par gyur kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-16: rdzu 'phrul dam pa thob pa de lta bu de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i grva gcig kyang bsgul bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-18: khyod dang 'dra ba de snyed 'dus pa lta zhog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-20: gal te 'dir sems can la la zhig skyes par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:58b-22: gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis ma brlabs pa kha'i rlung gcig gis rnam par 'thor bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-0: rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu @59a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-2: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams las byung ba'i rdul des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kun tu nog nog por gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed las byung ba'i rdul de des phyir yang brtul nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su so sor bzhag par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-6: 'o na sems can de rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-12: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-14: bu ram shing gi tshal lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-15: 'dam bu'i tshal lam; skam sa'i 'dam bu'i tshal lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-17: til gyis zhing bzhin du sems can de lta bu dag gis gang bar gyur kyang moonggal gyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-18: sems can rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa de lta bu de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi grva tsam yang bsgul bar mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par gdegs par bya ba lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa gnas de nyid du gnas shing sengge'i gdan de nyid la bzhugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59b-0: shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams @59b gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa g-yo bar mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59b-2: kun tu rab tu g-yo bar mdzad kyang sems can de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59b-5: kye ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'jig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59b-8: de dag 'di snyam du kye ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'thor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59b-11: sems can de dag la 'dul ba'i dbang gis kha cig la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59b-12: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dag gis chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59b-18: bu mo'i gzugs kyis kyang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59b-20: sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59b-22: rdzu 'phrul khyu mchog tu gyur pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dag la khyod yid ches par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:59b-23: phyogs bcu thams cad du'ang de bzhin no; ;moonggal gyi bu /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:64b-21: de las de mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems thob cing rin po che'i phung po de la mi lta bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:64b-23: rin po che'i phung po de la 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-0: @65a *// rin po che'i phung po ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-2: sems can dmyal ba'i phung po yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-3: de la lhag par zhen pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-4: log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro; ;snyam du de lta bur so sor rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-6: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa lta zhog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-8: yongs su brtag pa bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-9: shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed ji snyed yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-10: de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa de dag na sems can gzugs can nam gzugs can ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-11: 'du shes can nam 'du shes can ma yin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-12: 'du shes can yang ma yin 'du shes can ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa dag yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-13: sems can gyi khams su gdags pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-14: sems can de dag la bde bar bya ba'i phyir gang sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can de dag la gzugs rnams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-18: reg bya rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i mi la la zhig byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-19: sems can de dag thams cad kyang phrag ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-20: mgo bos blangs nas bskal pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65a-21: bskal pa las lhag par 'dzin par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-0: sems can de dag spyod @65b lam ji lta bus de la 'dug par 'dod pa de lta bus kyang 'dug par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-1: sems can de dag gi bshad gci'ang lag pa ya gcig gis blangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'dor na; brtan pa'i blo gros /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-3: 'o na mi des sems can de dag la bde ba'i yo byad mang pos so sor rim gro byas par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-6: mi des bde ba'i yo byad mang pos rim gro bgyis par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-10: khong du chud par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-11: mi des bde ba'i yo byad de lta bus rim gro byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-13: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-15: gang las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mnyan par bya ba'i phyir tha na byang chub sems dpa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i phyir ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-17: de la brtson par bya ba'i phyir gom pa 'dor ba gcig gis 'gro bar yang byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:65b-19: dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs @66a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-1: par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bar mdor zad pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-2: yongs su gtugs par nga mi smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-5: bde ba'i yo byad 'di la bde ba'i yo byad snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-8: bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-13: rgyur yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-15: bde ba'i yo byad snga ma de thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-16: rdzas las byung ba dang bcas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-17: shin tu mthar thug par mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-18: shin tu yongs su byang bar mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-20: chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-24: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-25: thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su smin par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-26: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-27: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-28: mang du thos pa la rag las par bstan pa yin no; ;brtan pa'i blo gros /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66a-29: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-0: 'od ma'i tshal bzhin @66b du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bkur sti byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-10: yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-12: so so so sor khor yug tu dpag tshad dang ldan pa'i mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa gdugs bsgrengs ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-14: bskal par gnas pa'i snang ba kun tu 'bar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-15: rab tu 'bar ba'i mar me dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-16: mchod yon dag gis brgyan pa dag byas par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-17: brtan pa'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-19: rigs kyi bu mo des gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-23: rigs kyi bu mo des bsod nams kyi phung po grangs ma mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-24: dpag tu ma mchis pa skyed lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-27: khong du chud par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-28: gang mi des ji skad bshad pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu gsog par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:66b-30: rigs kyi bu mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-0: gang las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams @67a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-1: yongs su smin par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mdo sde de lta bu dag mnyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-4: kun chub par bya ba'i phyir yongs su btsal ba la brtson par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-6: bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-9: bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang grangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-16: khyod phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la mdo sde de lta bu de dag mnyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-19: kun chub par bya ba'i phyir go cha gyon par sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-21: bsod nams kyi phung po de'i tsha dang nga mi smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-22: yongs su gtugs par yang mi smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-23: yongs su zad par yang nga mi smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-25: khyod sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i dpe tsam thos pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-26: phyogs tsam khong du chud par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul yang thos pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus rngo thogs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-35: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de che ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67a-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-0: brtan pa'i @67b blo gros; 'di ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-1: gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yungs 'brus yongs su gang bar gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-2: yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa yod pa de snyed kho na'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad kyi bra bo dag yod par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-3: de dag kyang bye ma dag gis so sor gang bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-6: bye ma'i phung po de mang ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-10: bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-13: gal te bye ma'i phung po de lag pas blangs nas phyogs bzher 'dor bar byed pa'i mi la la zhig byung bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-14: de 'phangs nas de ma thag tu gang dag bye ma'i phung po de las bye ma'i 'bru re re 'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'phen par byed pa'i rlung dag mngon par byung bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-17: shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ji snyed yod par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-18: phyogs thams cad du'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-21: dpag tu ma mchis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-23: dpag tu ma mchis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-26: khyod mos par bya; brtan pa'i blo gros /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-27: khyod khong du chud par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:67b-30: spyod lam gyis dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-0: @68a *// lam gyis dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-1: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-2: rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas dpag tu med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dpag tu med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-6: bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu gom pa gcig gis gshegs par mdzad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam rnam par 'khrugs par yang mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas da dung rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa thams cad kun tu bstan pa'ang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-8: se gol gtogs pa tsam gcig gis kyang phye ma'i phung po de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kho na'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu gom pas gshegs pa gcig gis gshegs par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-9: se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi tshul des kyang shar phyogs su gshegs pa nas phyogs bcur gshegs pa'i bar gyis zhag gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-11: zla ba gcig nas lo gcig gi bar du'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-12: lo brgyad nas lo stong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-13: lo 'bum gyi bar du gshegs par mdzad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-14: phyogs re rer yang lo bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar du gshegs par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-16: 'o na de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ji snyed yod par de bzhin gshegs pas byon pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mang ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68b-1: gal te bsod nams kyi phung po de gzugs can zhig tu gyur na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68b-2: re zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed du'ang mi shong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68b-5: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsod nams kyi phung po grangs med pa de rab tu mkhyen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68b-10: bgrang ba las 'das pa rab tu mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68b-12: gang gis bsod nams kyi phung po de shes par nus pa'i yi ge'i grangs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68b-14: bgrang ba'i grangs de ngas rab tu mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68b-15: gzhan du na grangs med pa'i grangs kho na dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68b-16: dpag tu med pa'i grangs kho nar 'gyur bar zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68b-17: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba'i bsod nams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:68b-19: de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i pha rol gyi 'ang ches pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags pa'i sgra zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po'i phung po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po'i phung po des kyang byang @69a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69a-1: chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ba nga'i 'og tu 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69a-2: zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69a-3: 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung pos snang ba chen po de mthong ste gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69a-5: sa g-yos pa chen po de'ang kun tu shes nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i phung po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69a-8: gsung bsal ba'i sgra de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69a-9: dog sa g-yos pa de su'i lags de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69a-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i phung pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes @69b la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-2: byang chub sems dpa' dpe med pa sems pa zhes bya ba dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-5: phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed go cha gang dag gis skyes bu dam pa de dag go cha bgos pa'i go cha de lta bu dag gis stong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-6: rigs kyi bu; skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag thos pa'ang mchog tu rnyed par dka' na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-7: blta ba'am bsnyen bkur bya ba lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-14: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-16: de'i dus la dbab par shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-17: song la bcom ldan 'das de la padma bdun po 'di dag kyang phul te phul nas kyang bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i phun po gnod pa chung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:69b-20: stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:70a-0: @70a *// zhes de skad ces gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:70a-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i phung po de la rnam par bltas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:70a-2: bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das de'i thad nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:70a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid phung po de 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:70a-5: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:70a-6: lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig des 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags pa'i sgra nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:70a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:70a-8: de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:70a-9: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:80b-12: zhes bya ba byin nas kyang dge slong mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:81b-5: gti mug gi sems ma bskyed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-5: gang nas kyang blangs pa ma yin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-17: 'jig rten snang byed rnams ni dkon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-18: au dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i sems de'ang dkon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-22: dpa' bo yi ni sems de yang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-27: de bzhin mi 'jigs rnams kyang snang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-28: de las sengge'i sgra sgrog dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-29: drang srong smra bar nga yis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-30: yang dag 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-31: chos kyi 'khor lo'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82a-32: nga yi ma 'dres bco brgyad chos //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82b-4: ting 'dzin pha rol phyin pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82b-5: shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:82b-17: bla na med pa'i ye shes kyang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83a-24: de la snying por mi gzung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83a-25: de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83a-26: brten nas sems ni bskyed gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83a-27: nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur zhing //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83a-29: de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83a-30: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83a-36: de dag gzugs kyis lung ma bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83a-37: tshor bas kyang ni lung ma bstan //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-1: 'di la chos rnams mi dmigs kyang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-4: mtshan med de 'dra'i shes ldan zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-5: shes pas rlom sems mi byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-6: de dag byang chub lung bstan to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-9: bong ba'i chad pas mtshon chad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-10: de dag mi mjed can du 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-11: gang dag bzod pa de 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-12: legs par skyes par gyur pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-13: de dag rnyed dang bkur sti bzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-14: de ni rnyed pas rlom sems med //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-17: mtha' gnyis zil gyis mnan nas su //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-21: de ni byang chub lam yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-22: ngas kyang de ni bsten pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-23: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bsngags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:83b-26: de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams blo gros rab gnas zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @84a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84a-1: pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rigs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla bas snang ba de mthong ste //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84a-6: gsung bsal ba'i sgra grags pa de dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84a-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84a-13: gsung bsal ba'i sgra grags pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang @84b chub sems dpa' zla bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84b-2: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de'i thad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84b-3: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das des skabs phye nas byang chub sems dpa' zla bas bcom ldan 'das de las rnam par bltas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84b-7: te bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'gro bar chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs des byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lag par lag pa lta bu'i me tog ku mu da byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84b-9: 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:84b-11: khyod kyis lag pa lta bu'i me tog ku mu da 'di bcom ldan 'das de la phul la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:138b-5: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:139a-0: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya @139a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:139a-2: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:139a-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:139a-4: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam par sems zhes bya ba btang ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:139a-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-050-001:139a-10: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo //
